languages.text: "Рада стараться, Лорд-капитан. Всегда приятно встретить ценителя ремесла".
"I am delighted to hear it, Lord Captain. It is always a pleasure to meet a connoisseur of the craft."
languages.original_text: "Рада стараться, Лорд-капитан. Всегда приятно встретить ценителя ремесла".

traits.locale_text: "I am delighted to hear it, Lord Captain. It is always a pleasure to meet a connoisseur of the craft."
"I am delighted to hear it, Lord Captain. It is always a pleasure to meet a connoisseur of the craft."
"I am delighted to hear it, Lord Captain. It is always a pleasure to meet a connoisseur of the craft."
"I am delighted to hear it, Lord Captain. It is always a pleasure to meet a connoisseur of the craft."
"I am delighted to hear it, Lord Captain. It is always a pleasure to meet a connoisseur of the craft."

languages.text: “很高兴听到这样的话，舰长大人。能遇到同样懂得这门艺术的鉴赏大师，这实在是令人满心愉悦。”
languages.original_text: "I am delighted to hear it, Lord Captain. It is always a pleasure to meet a connoisseur of the craft."

traits.locale_text: “很高兴听到这样的话，舰长大人。能遇到同样懂得这门艺术的鉴赏大师，这实在是令人满心愉悦。”

languages.text: «Me alegra oírlo, Lord Capitán. Siempre es un placer conocer a alguien familiarizado con este arte».
languages.original_text: "I am delighted to hear it, Lord Captain. It is always a pleasure to meet a connoisseur of the craft."

traits.locale_text: «Me alegra oírlo, Lord Capitán. Siempre es un placer conocer a alguien familiarizado con este arte».

languages.text: 「それが聞けて嬉しいです、ロード・キャプテン。この船の目利きの方にお目にかかるのは、いつだって光栄です」
languages.original_text: "I am delighted to hear it, Lord Captain. It is always a pleasure to meet a connoisseur of the craft."

traits.locale_text: 「それが聞けて嬉しいです、ロード・キャプテン。この船の目利きの方にお目にかかるのは、いつだって光栄です」

languages.text: "Freut mich sehr, das zu hören, Lord Captain. Es ist stets eine Freude, {mf|einen Kenner|eine Kennerin} des Handwerks zu treffen."
languages.original_text: "I am delighted to hear it, Lord Captain. It is always a pleasure to meet a connoisseur of the craft."

traits.locale_text: "Freut mich sehr, das zu hören, Lord Captain. Es ist stets eine Freude, {mf|einen Kenner|eine Kennerin} des Handwerks zu treffen."

languages.text: « Voilà qui fait plaisir à entendre, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. C'est toujours une joie de rencontrer {mf|un connaisseur|une connaisseuse}. »
languages.original_text: "I am delighted to hear it, Lord Captain. It is always a pleasure to meet a connoisseur of the craft."

traits.locale_text: « Voilà qui fait plaisir à entendre, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. C'est toujours une joie de rencontrer {mf|un connaisseur|une connaisseuse}. »

languages.text: "Bunu duyduğuma çok memnun oldum Lord Kaptan. Zanaatın ustasıyla karşılaşmak, benim için her zaman bir zevktir."
languages.original_text: "I am delighted to hear it, Lord Captain. It is always a pleasure to meet a connoisseur of the craft."
